name: Ignarus
storyline:
What began an average day, took a drastic turn thanks to protagonists good friend, Jarren.
While exploring Memoria Forest for Jarrens lost brother, strange things kept happening to the kids, it's almost as if the forest was trying to warn them to turn back...
Before they knew it... They were attacked, and suddenly at peril,
Barely escaping some sort of attack, they were separated... and in a strange, and different place...
Slay fierce monsters-
Conquer challenging puzzles-
Acquaint new faces-
Encounter challenging bosses-
Overcome the Curse of "Memoria" and get back home.
summary:
Ignarus is a Dark old school Action RPG with a story to tell.
There will be experience gained to level up and learn new abilities, as well as challenging monsters and boss battles to test your skills.
Some dungeons and puzzles will test your wits and solving skills and leave you satisfied.
